explains: n. 生存能力，发育能力；可行性
wordGroup: financial viability 财政活力；财务可行性
economic viability 经济可行性，经济生存能力

sentences.en: That is exactly why a more sensible preservation strategy would be to assist the farmers to modernize their farms to the extent needed to maintain viability.
sentences.cn: 这就是为什么更明智的保护策略应该是帮助农民实现农场现代化，以维持其生存能力。

sentences.en: The continued viability of the kiva itself in Spanish mission settlements has also been underestimated by historians.
sentences.cn: 基瓦本身在西班牙传教定居点的持续生命力也被历史学家们低估了。

sentences.en: The pollen viability of Miscanthus sinensis was determined by in vitro pollen germination method.
sentences.cn: 采用离体花粉萌发法测定了芒豆的花粉活力。
